评论详情: Ignore the negative reviews. This bra is amazing and has been a Gossard bestseller for a long time for a reason! I own 5 of these in different colors! However, low plunge bras are no joke if you have large breasts, so ladies, go to your local bra shop and get properly sized or consult the Gossard website. I always used to buy 38D, and hated lingerie. I always felt like it was uncomfortable and thought I was doomed to boring bras forever until I visited my local bra shop. The gals educated me on proper bra care and sizing and got me into my proper size, 32G!!! In the photo, I am wearing a 36DD (not my size) but it was on super clearance that I had to take it. That's how much I love these bras! To piggyback on everyone else, the back smoothing is amazing and makes it so comfy, and I can wear this bra with so many outfits because of the plunge!

I purchased this bra to wear with a dress that has a deep V-cut in the front. The cup size was a bit too small (I should have ordered a size up) and I do pop a little, but I still wear this bra. It lifts and separated while still being very comfortable. I was surprised by how supportive it is for how light weight it is! Will consider buying again.

评论概述: I don’t usually wear unpadded bras, but I love this one
评论详情: I bought this to wear under a kinda see-through shirt. I never use unpadded bras due to the size of my chest, I always felt like they wouldn’t offer a good level of support. This bra exceeded my expectations. It has a good support level even at a 36F, and it’s comfortable. I’d buy it again in a heartbeat if anything happened to the first one I bought

I am a natural 36 F and although it fit well and gave good support the underwire began poking through into my armpits after only 6 months of wearing it once or twice a week. I tried repairing it multiple times but each time the sharp underwire would just poke a new hole. Additionally the hooks in the front did not hold there shape after some time and began to bulge out in the middle. So sad because it’s a beautiful bra.

I’ve always struggled as someone with a larger bust to try and find a bra that works! Being a 34 G and not wanting to add any more bulk to my bust has always been a problem but this bra is amazing. It’s light weight but still supportive and it’s cute but sexy with the lace and front closure! Love it

This fit a little more shallow in the cup than I expected. I own other bras from this brand in 32ddd and while this fit, it does seem to be a bit  small in the cup. Absolutely beautiful though and definitely worth keeping.

评论概述: Perfect bra for my low cut dress/ample bust
评论详情: I usually wear a 42F. It’s practically impossible to find a low cut bra in that size. This was the 6th bra I ordered. I’m so pleased!
10 out of 10 amazing bra. I’m 5’3 180lbs size 38 DDD for reference I ordered a 38FF and all I could say it that it fits amazing and is just so beautiful. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
Fits beautifully, supports, well made.
This one is tricky as the low band does flip up. But, it’s perfect for super low cut dresses and tops. I’m ok with the flipping up in order to wear those outfits.

My boobs keep getting bigger as an unexpected (and unwelcome) feature of menopause. It's grown increasingly difficult to find bras to hold these puppies up/in place, but this bralette DID THE TRICK! I PLAN to buy more when my size is back in stock (36F/FF), and it's very comfortable and pretty!

Great experience and really nice product!

评论详情: I really love this bralette. It’s sexy and flattering and fits as expected. 评论概述: Cup sizes do not translate, not great for heavy breasts
评论详情: Keeping it as it is super comfortable and a great wear around the house bra. Usually wear a 32DDD and ordered the 32E which is supposed to be the same size. Sadly the cups are too small and it does cut the breasts under clothing. Granted if the clothing is low enough, it just gives cleavage.  Needed a measurement chart that translated better. Would love to figure out how many cup sizes I need to go up to get the proper fit. The band was way more comfortable than a higher band. Takes so much pressure off the shoulders and is very soft.  Update- Still want to love this bra, but definitely have an issue with falling out. It takes WAY more adjusting to stay in this bra than I have energy for. Dropping the rating as it hasn’t been wearable comfortably due this problem. I can start off totally in the bra, but in 30 minutes we’re in trouble.

评论概述: Lace and color is beautiful. Fit is a little large and not as "boosting" as I had hoped
评论详情: I got this in the purple.  The lace and the details are so beautiful.  I'm confused about the purpose of the lining on the outer 1/3 of the bra. I have pretty prominent nipples so those did not have as much coverage from the bra as I would have liked. It would have been great to have lining through the whole cup. The lace texture helps a bit, but you can always add the nipple cover things if needed. The cup runs a little bit big. I'm usually a DD but this DD was a little too large in the cup for me, so I'm going to exchange for a size down (cup-wise). The band was about what I expected size-wise. It was more supportive than I thought it would be. I love the underwire! Also, if you have breasts that are a little wider apart (I have "east-west breasts") and want some cleavage, this bra probably won't do it.  It didn't for me. The only other thing I’d change about the design is to give the straps some pretty lace details so that when you where tank tops you can see it poking through.
Love this type of bra in the size range
Just wish it was a little thicker in material...

It fits as expected. The design isn't great though, and it comes up really high under my armpits. I was hoping to wear this with racer-back dresses, but there's no way because there's so much fabric under my arms that a dress won't cover it.  Not especially supportive for the breasts since the material is too stretchy, but the underwire isn't good for leisure wear either. For material that thin and stretchy, the underwire support is useless since the material won't support the breast.
Love this! Very comfortable and versatile.

评论概述: I wish the description said this was UK sized!
评论详情: I ordered my US size 32G believing this was US sized. NOT SO. The underwire is HUGE and the cups wrinkle, this is most definitely UK sized and I need two sizes smaller - ie. a 32F! I now have to pay $6 return shipping. And Amazon doesn't have my size in a color I like =(

评论概述: Supportive, sexy, and say goodbye to bra band "back fat"!
评论详情: I'm 5'5", 145 muscular build, size small, 32E bra. This longline is sexy as hell -- love wearing it under sheer and low cut tops. If you're daring enough you cold probably rock it as a sexy crop top without covering it up. Great lift and separation. Super comfortable, and I love the front closure. The longline style eliminates common bra-related "back fat" issues -- this style creates smooth lines under snug tees and tops; no cutting in. I liked it so much I now have it in 4 different colors. Highly recommend.

Very difficult to find this cut of bralet  for the ample busted woman. So happy with the fit and even though deep cut, it is difficult that the girls escape! Very pretty and well fitting. I will be purchasing another.

评论概述: Cute in the photo, cute on the hanger, not on the body.
评论详情: I had initially ordered this bra because it looked cute, was available in smaller bands with larger cup sizes, and had a soft cup. I don't need any extra help with lift or volume, and lined bras can provide a little too much of both. It looked cute in the photo and on the hanger. Unfortunately, that's where the cuteness stopped. The band was a few inches too small (a 32 fit like a 30, and would barely fasten), and the cups were very unflattering. I ended up returning this bra for all the above reasons, and wouldn't recommend unless you fit the normal Target size range.

Fell in love with this the instant I put it on!  I'm a 36FF usually, which is what I ordered.  I am ordering another one (20 minutes after receiving this one!) in 34G.  I'd say it fits pretty true to size - I am only reordering down because I am sort of between sizes and losing a little weight, and I want it to last.  My husband really, really liked it also. SCORE!  Seriously flattering; very sexy.  If you are waffling, don't - just get it!

I have several other Gossard items that I love and this is equally well made and well-fitting. I have a hard time finding bras that don’t dig into the outer sides of my breasts but this is perfect. The only down side is that it sits closer to my neck than in the pictures so the straps sometimes show in anything wider than a crew neck.

Wow. I don't want to take it off. So sexy, so sweet, such a perfect fit. I got the 36 DD and it's amazing. I needed a plunging bra for a wedding where my bridesmaid dress has a wrap top. I wanted to downplay my assests for modesty's sake, but other bras I tried made my chest way too elevated. This bra gave some light support without putting everything on a shelf. Everything I could have hoped for!!
Very cute, fit as expected.

I love the cut and style of this- fits and looks awesome. Has surprising amount of support for my 34G size. As with any bra the underwires will eventually get uncomfortable after hours of wearing it.
